text: Alexander Zverev was the two-time defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Nick Kyrgios won the title, defeating Daniil Medvedev in the final 7–6(8–6), 7–6(7–4). ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Lucky losers=== ===Qualifying draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ====Fifth qualifier==== ====Sixth qualifier==== ==References== *Main draw *Qualifying draw Citi Open - Men's Singles 2019 Men's Singles
title: 2019 Citi Open – Men's Singles
